attributes.action: Make chiropractic treatment available on the nhs
attributes.background: Chiropractic treatment is effective but yet expensive.lots of people suffer every day because they can't afford this private treatment and especially those on benefits.this treatment should be recognized and readily available on the NHS.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because chiropractic treatment is available on the NHS in some areas and circumstances. 

The decision on whether to offer chiropractic treatment is the responsibility of clinical commissioning groups and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more here.

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/chiropractic/
